title: What Does the 🍒 (Cherry) Emoji Mean in Texting and on Social Media?

steps.title: Summer is here!
steps.content: Summer is here! Depending on where you live, cherries are in season from May through August. Many users use 🍒 with other summery symbols to show they’re excited for the hot weather to finally come through. [1] X Research source “Summer is here! ☀️🌊🍒” “Summertime here we come 🍒”

steps.title: You eat a healthy diet.
steps.content: You eat a healthy diet. Cherries are a low-calorie treat full of vitamins, nutrients, fiber, and vitamins. If you see someone posting about their new diet or workout regimen and you see 🍒, chances are they’re referencing how nutritious cherries are. [2] X Research source Look at the food or smoothie in their photos—cherries are probably a main ingredient. “I love my morning smoothie! 🌅🍒” “New year, new diet 🥑🥦🍒”

steps.title: You think someone’s hot.
steps.content: You think someone’s hot. 🍒 can be code for saying a person is sexy or beautiful. Use it in a compliment or add a few 🍒’s in a comment on a photo to show that you like what you see. [3] X Research source “She is 🍒!!” “🍒🍒🍒”

steps.title: Cherries are your favorite food.
steps.content: Cherries are your favorite food. Of course, sometimes 🍒 just means a plain old cherry. If you see it paired with other food or drink emojis, it means it’s a main ingredient or flavor in a dish, dessert, or cocktail someone’s talking about. “It’s 5 o’clock somewhere! 🍒🍸” “Let’s have 🍒🥧 for dessert”

steps.title: You’re talking about virginity or doing something new.
steps.content: You’re talking about virginity or doing something new. For centuries, the cherry has been a symbol of virginity and purity, due to its bright and unblemished exterior. Today, the phrase “popping one’s cherry” means losing your virginity or doing something new for the first time, so seeing 🍒 could be a subtle way to talk about a new experience or having sex for the first time. [4] X Research source “I popped her 🍒.” “I popped my haunted house 🍒. It was so much fun!”

steps.title: You’re in a relationship.
steps.content: You’re in a relationship. In recent years, a “fruit code” has emerged for women to share their relationship status on social media. [5] X Research source 🍒 means you’re in a committed relationship since the emoji features 2 cherries joined by their stems. [6] X Research source It might also mean “twins” or “best friends.” “We’re engaged! 💍🍒” “Shout out to my bestie, she’s the realest 🍒”

steps.title: You’re talking about your private parts.
steps.content: You’re talking about your private parts. Like a lot of emojis, 🍒 has a naughty meaning besides a tasty a summer fruit. It can reference your derrière, breasts, or testicles—basically any private part that comes in a pair. “That baseball hit him right in the 🍒” “You’re a pain in my 🍒”

steps.title: You’ve struck luck in gambling.
steps.content: You’ve struck luck in gambling. When it comes to slot machines, 2 cherries usually indicates a small win or payout. Cherries are featured on slot machines because they used to represent the flavor of gum you could win. [7] X Research source Today, double cherries symbolize good luck and fortune in gambling. “I hit 🍒🍒 in slots!” “I made $$$$$ playing Double Cherry 🍒🍒.”

steps.title: Substitute 🍒 for "cherry."
steps.content: Substitute 🍒 for "cherry." Sometimes an emoji just looks more engaging than the word it represents. Keep your messages short and fun by swapping in the cherry emoji. “We need some 🍒 to make this fruit salad POP!” “Remember when we were obsessed with 🍒 chapstick in junior high?”

steps.title: Caption a photo of you and your partner.
steps.content: Caption a photo of you and your partner. Post a selfie of you and your significant other or your bestie. Use 🍒 to tell the world that you’re happy to be stuck together. “It’s just you and me baby 🍒” “BFFs since we could walk! 🍒”

steps.title: Celebrate summer vacation.
steps.content: Celebrate summer vacation. Include cherries in your string of summertime emojis to show how excited you are for beach season. You might be rejoicing that school’s out, that you get to travel, or just that the weather is nice! “Alexa, play School’s Out For Summer 🎵☀️🍒🥳” “Michigan vacay at last! 🏖️🍒😌”

steps.title: Share updates on your nutritious diet.
steps.content: Share updates on your nutritious diet. Show your followers pics of the delicious healthy treats you’re whipping up. Cherry’s a popular flavor—they’ll be hounding you for your recipes! “I love a smoothie for breakfast 🍒🥤💪 drink up!” “Hitting your fitness goals isn’t hard when they taste good! 🍒”

steps.title: Tell someone they’re lookin’ good.
steps.content: Tell someone they’re lookin’ good. Make someone’s day and pay them a cherry-flavored compliment. Add 🍒 to the end of your praise, or include it in a string of other emojis that say “you’re making me sweat!” “Hey there beautiful 🍒” “🔥🍒🥵”

steps.title: Spice up your sexting.
steps.content: Spice up your sexting. If you’re a little bashful when it comes to dirty talk, emojis are a fun way to communicate without spelling out naughty words. Use 🍒 in place of a private part, or add some question marks to imply the question, “Do you want a taste?” “Play nice and I’ll send you a pic of my 🍒” “🍒🍒? 😏”

steps.title: Talk about a new experience with a friend.
steps.content: Talk about a new experience with a friend. Whether you’ve just lost your virginity or tried something new, “popped my 🍒” is the perfect slang phrase to describe your experience. It isn’t exactly for polite conversation, so save it for texts with your best buddies. “Just popped my escape room 🍒 ” “I can’t wait to pop my friend’s Subtronic's cherry 🍒🔊🌟🎆🎵”

steps.title: Mention you got a small payout in gambling.
steps.content: Mention you got a small payout in gambling. If you’ve scored double cherries on the slot machine, share it on social media or with your loved ones. Pair it with other gambling-related emojis to show extra excitement! “It’s payday...🍒🍒” “All I do is win, win, win 🍒🍒🎰💰🍀💸”

steps.title: Highlight the 🍒 emoji, right-click the mouse or trackpad, and hit “Copy.”
steps.content: Highlight the 🍒 emoji, right-click the mouse or trackpad, and hit “Copy.” Then, navigate to the space you want to paste the emoji, right-click the mouse or trackpad, and hit “Paste” to copy and paste the 🍒 emoji on your computer. The 🍒 emoji’s unicode is U+1F352. If you need to display the cherry emoji in your HTML code, type in “&#x1F352.” [8] X Research source Some fonts, like Twemoji and EmojiOne, include a wide range of emojis you can use, as long as you include a reference to the font in your HTML code and use the corresponding character code.

steps.title: Need to switch things up with your emojis?
steps.content: Need to switch things up with your emojis? Swap some of these in for your cherries to communicate a similar message. [9] X Research source After all, variety is the spice of life! 👬🏾 = Twinning 👩‍❤️‍👩 = In a relationship, my partner 🍑 = Someone’s behind 🍎🥦🥑 = Healthy food (any fruit or veggie will do) 🌻☀️🌊 = Summertime (anything about the sun or the beach will work)
